tool_description: An API showing all the latest covid vaccine news around the world
name: Vaccine Live
title: Vaccine Live

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source
api_list.description: Get news about Covid vaccine a specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vaccine-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/telegraph"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vaccine-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vaccine-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaper}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vaccine-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Covid Vaccine News
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all the Covid vaccine news from all over the world.
